text: aur (aath din phaaqa karate chale) jab shahar madiyan ke kuon par (jo shahar ke baahar tha) pahunchen to kuon par logon kee bheed dekhee ki vah (apane jaanavaron ko) paanee pila rahe hain aur un sabake peechhe do aurato (hazarat shueb kee betiyon) ko dekha ki vah (apanee bakariyon ko) roke khadee hai moosa ne poochha ki tumhaara kya matalab hai vah bolee jab tak sab charavaahe (apane jaanavaron ko) khoob chhak ke paanee pila kar phir na jaen ham nahin pila sakate aur hamaare vaalid bahut boodhe hain
